name: part_005
file: tmp_【 #アキロゼ生誕祭2024 】ーFantasia of Bremenー￤3DLIVE【ホロライブ⧸アキ・ローゼンタール】 [pFZiKpoxuvw]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_005.mov

scenes.description: The finale of the first song performance featuring Aki Rosenthal, Inugami Korone, Takanashi Kiara, Houshou Marine, and Nekomata Okayu. The song 'Bremen' ends, and they thank the audience as the curtain closes.
A transition to a solo performance by Aki Rosenthal. She performs a cover of 'Byoushin wo Kamu' by ZUTOMAYO in a dark, atmospheric stage setting with clock and gear motifs.

subtitles.original: ブレーメンへ行こう
subtitles.english: Let's go to Bremen

subtitles.original: Welcome to Bremen Music Festival!!
subtitles.english: Welcome to Bremen Music Festival!!

subtitles.original: #アキロゼ生誕祭2024
subtitles.english: #AkiRoseBirthday2024

subtitles.original: ありがとうございました！
subtitles.english: Thank you so much!

subtitles.original: 秒針を噛む
subtitles.english: Bite the Second Hand

subtitles.original: 生活の偽造 いつも通り 通り過ぎて
subtitles.english: Faking my life, passing through as usual

subtitles.original: 1回言ったわかった戻らない
subtitles.english: I said it once, I understand, there's no going back

subtitles.original: 確信犯でしょ？
subtitles.english: You're doing it on purpose, aren't you?

subtitles.original: 夕食中に泣いた後 君は笑ってた
subtitles.english: After crying during dinner, you were laughing

subtitles.original: 「私もそうだよ」って 偽りの気持ちが 誕生して
subtitles.english: Saying "I'm the same too," a false feeling is born

subtitles.original: 吐いて 黙って ずっと黙って
subtitles.english: Spit it out, shut up, shut up forever

subtitles.original: 何が何でも 面と向かって さようなら
subtitles.english: No matter what, face-to-face, goodbye

subtitles.original: する資格もないまま 僕は
subtitles.english: Without even the right to do so, I...

subtitles.original: 灰に潜り 秒針を噛み
subtitles.english: Diving into the ashes, biting the second hand

subtitles.original: 白昼夢の中で ガンガン砕いた
subtitles.english: Smashed it hard within a daydream

subtitles.original: でも壊れない 止まってくれない
subtitles.english: But it won't break, it won't stop

subtitles.original: 本当を知らないまま 進むのさ
subtitles.english: I'll keep going without knowing the truth

subtitles.original: このまま 奪って 隠して 忘れたい
subtitles.english: Just like this, I want to snatch it away, hide it, and forget

subtitles.original: 分かり合うまるひとつもなくても
subtitles.english: Even if there's not a single bit of mutual understanding

subtitles.original: 会って 「ごめん」って 言えたら 良かった
subtitles.english: It would have been better if we could meet and say "I'm sorry"

subtitles.original: 形のない言葉はいらないから
subtitles.english: I don't need words without form

subtitles.original: 消えない後遺症
subtitles.english: A lingering aftereffect

subtitles.original: 何でも受け入れていると
subtitles.english: If you accept everything

subtitles.original: 言ったっきり もう 変えることはない
subtitles.english: Once you've said it, you won't change it

subtitles.original: でたらめでも 僕のためじゃなくても
subtitles.english: Even if it's nonsense, even if it's not for me

subtitles.original: 君に守られた
subtitles.english: I was protected by you

subtitles.original: 目も 口も 意味がないほどに
subtitles.english: Eyes and mouth, to the point of being meaningless

subtitles.original: 塞ぎ込んで 動けない 僕を
subtitles.english: Trapped and unable to move, me...

subtitles.original: 見つけないで ほっといてくれないか
subtitles.english: Don't find me, just leave me alone?

subtitles.original: どこ見ても どこにいても 明かない
subtitles.english: Wherever I look, wherever I am, it won't open

subtitles.original: 灰に潜り 秒針を噛み
subtitles.english: Diving into the ashes, biting the second hand

subtitles.original: 白昼夢の中で ガンガン砕いた
subtitles.english: Smashed it hard within a daydream

subtitles.original: でも壊れない 止まってくれない
subtitles.english: But it won't break, it won't stop

subtitles.original: 演じ続けるのなら
subtitles.english: If you're going to keep acting

subtitles.original: このまま 奪って 隠して 忘れたい
subtitles.english: Just like this, I want to snatch it away, hide it, and forget

subtitles.original: 分かり合うまるひとつもなくても
subtitles.english: Even if there's not a single bit of mutual understanding

subtitles.original: 会って 「ごめん」って 言えたら 良かった
subtitles.english: It would have been better if we could meet and say "I'm sorry"

subtitles.original: 形のない言葉はいらないから
subtitles.english: I don't need words without form

subtitles.original: すべて叫んで 痣はない
subtitles.english: Scream everything out, there are no bruises

subtitles.original: 笑って転んで 情けない
subtitles.english: Laughing and falling, it's pathetic

subtitles.original: 誰のせいでもないことを 誰かのせいにしたくて
subtitles.english: Wanting to blame someone for something that's no one's fault

subtitles.original: 僕はいるのかな
subtitles.english: Am I even here?

subtitles.original: 本当は分かってるんだ
subtitles.english: Actually, I know

subtitles.original: 見放されても 信じてしまうよ
subtitles.english: Even if I'm abandoned, I'll still believe

subtitles.original: このまま 奪って 隠して 忘れたい
subtitles.english: Just like this, I want to snatch it away, hide it, and forget

subtitles.original: このまま 奪って 隠して 忘れたい
subtitles.english: Just like this, I want to snatch it away, hide it, and forget

subtitles.original: このまま 奪って 話したい
subtitles.english: Just like this, I want to take it away and talk

subtitles.original: 分かり合うまるひとつもなくても
subtitles.english: Even if there's not a single bit of mutual understanding

subtitles.original: 会って 「ごめん」って 言えたら 良かった
subtitles.english: It would have been better if we could meet and say "I'm sorry"

subtitles.original: 疑うだけの 僕をどうして
subtitles.english: Why do you... me, who only doubts

subtitles.original: 救い切れない 嘘はいらないから
subtitles.english: I don't need lies that can't fully save me

subtitles.original: 今宵も頭上では
subtitles.english: Tonight as well, above my head

subtitles.original: 綺麗な満月が キラキラ
subtitles.english: A beautiful full moon is sparkling

subtitles.original: 幸せそうに 世界を
subtitles.english: Happily... the world
